Site Time Tracker: Your Personal Web Time Management Assistant
Are you curious about how you spend your time online? Do you want to boost your productivity by understanding your browsing habits? Site Time Tracker is here to help! This powerful yet user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to effortlessly monitor and analyze the time you spend on different websites.
Key Features:

Automatic Time Tracking:
Site Time Tracker works silently in the background, accurately recording the time you spend on each website. No manual input required - just browse as you normally would, and let the extension do the work for you.
Real-Time Updates:
Watch your browsing time update in real-time. The extension's popup display refreshes every second, giving you up-to-the-moment insights into your web activity.
Intuitive Visual Interface:
With a clean and easy-to-read display, you can quickly see which sites are consuming most of your time. Each entry includes the website's favicon for easy recognition.
Persistent Data Storage:
Your browsing data is securely stored locally, ensuring your information remains private while allowing you to track your habits over time, even after browser restarts.
Detailed Time Breakdown:
See your time spent on each site broken down into hours, minutes, and seconds. Whether you've spent 5 seconds or 5 hours on a site, Site Time Tracker has you covered.
Cross-Tab Tracking:
The extension intelligently tracks your time across multiple tabs and windows, giving you a comprehensive view of your browsing activity.
Privacy-Focused:
All data is stored locally on your device. We don't collect or transmit any of your browsing data, ensuring your online activity remains private.

How It Works:

Installation:
Once installed, Site Time Tracker begins working immediately. No setup or configuration required!
Tracking:
As you browse the web, the extension silently logs the time you spend on each unique domain.
Viewing Your Data:
Click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to open a popup showing your current browsing session's statistics.
Analysis:
Use the data to gain insights into your online habits. Identify time-sinks and adjust your browsing habits accordingly.

Who Can Benefit:

Professionals looking to optimize their workday
Students aiming to balance study time and leisure browsing
Anyone curious about their internet usage patterns
Digital well-being enthusiasts seeking to maintain a healthy relationship with technology

Privacy and Permissions:
Site Time Tracker requires minimal permissions to function effectively:

Tabs: To identify which websites you're visiting
Storage: To save your browsing data locally
Active Tab: To accurately track time in the current active tab

We take your privacy seriously. All data is stored locally on your device and is never transmitted or shared.
Tips for Getting the Most Out of Site Time Tracker:

Regular Check-ins: Make it a habit to check your stats at the end of each day or week to understand your browsing patterns.
Set Goals: Use the insights gained to set personal goals for time spent on specific sites.
Productivity Boost: Identify which websites are your biggest time-sinks and use this knowledge to stay focused during work or study sessions.
Digital Well-being: Use the data to ensure a healthy balance between productive and leisure browsing.

Future Development:
We're committed to continually improving Site Time Tracker. Some features we're considering for future updates include:

Customizable categories for grouping similar websites
Daily, weekly, and monthly reports
Optional alerts when you exceed a set time limit on a specific site
Data export functionality for advanced analysis

Your feedback is crucial in shaping the future of Site Time Tracker. We encourage you to reach out with any suggestions or feature requests.
Get Started Today:
Ready to gain valuable insights into your online activity? Install Site Time Tracker now and take the first step towards more mindful and productive web browsing. Whether you're looking to boost productivity, balance your digital life, or simply satisfy your curiosity about your online habits, Site Time Tracker is your perfect companion in the digital world.
Take control of your online time - let Site Time Tracker be your guide to a more productive and balanced digital life!"
